item.title: Step 1 Writeup
item.description: How I passed Step 1 after 8 months of medical school using only Anking and UWorld.

item.title: Resources
item.description: Science Olympiad I enjoy science outreach and have been a Science Olympiad event supervisor since 2018. Exams I have written are listed below. [Anatomy and Physiology] 2023 MIT Science Olympiad Invitational Tournament Exam Answer Sheet Answer Key [Water Quality] 2020 Pennsylvania Science Olympiad Regional Tournament Exam Image Booklet Answer Booklet Answer Key [Water Quality] 2019 Pennsylvania Science Olympiad State Tournament Exam Image Booklet Answer Booklet Answer Key [Water Quality] 2019 Pennsylvania Science Olympiad Regional Tournament Exam Image Booklet Answer Booklet Answer Key
